ComicInfo.Summary:
Join the adventure that began right where Season 2 left off! Vasi and her long-dormant Ancients have taken over Destiny, leaving Colonel Young, Eli and a small handful of the crew to try to take back the ship - a vessel they've never had full control of in the best of times. Stargate Atlantis writers Mark L. Haynes & J.C. Vaughn and new series artist Eliseu Gouveia (Equilibrium) take us Back To Destiny! Stargate Universe comes with three variant covers by interior artist Greg LaRocque, a Photo Cover, and an exclusive Retailer Incentive Flashback Photo cover!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Greg LaRocque | 1 | Var | Photo Variant Cover | Photo | 2 | RI | 1:3 Retailer Incentive Flashback Cover | Photo | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-02 07:50:36. [CVDB649811]
ComicInfo.Writer: J. C. Vaughn, Mark L. Haynes
ComicInfo.Characters: Adam Brody, Dale Volker, Eli Wallace, Everett Young, Gary Guzzo, Matthew Scott, Nicholas Rush, Ronald Greer, Tamara Johansen, Vasi
